channel.title: CVE Feed for onWebChat -- Live Chat - Live support
channel.description: The latest CVEs for onWebChat -- Live Chat - Live support

item.title: CVE-2020-5642|2024-08-04T08:39:25.686Z -- onwebchat -- live%20chat%20-%20live%20support
item.description: Cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Live Chat - Live support version 3.1.0 and earlier allows remote attackers to hijack the authentication of administrators via unspecified vectors.
